mapper.select: select * from favoriteinfo where id = #{id} and no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into favoriteinfo (ID, dong, AptName, dealAmount, area, floor, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, lat, lng) values (#{ID}, #{dong}, #{AptName}, #{dealAmount}, #{area}, #{floor}, #{buildYear}, #{dealYear}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealDay}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.delete: delete from favoriteinfo where ID=#{ID} and AptName=#{AptName} and area = #{area}
